#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define pi pair<long long int,long long int>
#define INFINIT 1000000007
vector <long long int> pr,we;
vector <long long int> :: iterator it;
long long int dp[510][10010];
int main()
{
    long long int i,j,k,l,m,n,t,count1=0,W,a,b;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin >> a >> b >> n;
        W=b-a;
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            cin >> k;
            pr.push_back(k);

            cin >> k;
            we.push_back(k);

        }

        for(i=0;i<=n;i++)
            dp[i][0]=0;

        for(j=1;j<=W;j++)
            dp[0][j]=INFINIT;

        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            for(j=1;j<=W;j++)
            {
                dp[i][j]=dp[i-1][j];

                if(j>=we[i-1])
                {
                    dp[i][j]=min(dp[i][j],pr[i-1]+dp[i][j-we[i-1]]);
                }
            }
        }

        pr.clear();
        we.clear();
        if(dp[n][W]!=INFINIT)
        cout << "The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is  "<< dp[n][W] << "." << "\n";

        else
        cout << "This is impossible.\n";
    }

    return 0;
}
